definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: He kept chopping about from kindness to cruelty towards his pupils.
sentences.chinese: 他对学生们忽而和蔼可亲，忽而冷酷无情。

sentences.english: He kept chopping about from kindness to cruelty towards his pupils.
sentences.chinese: 他对学生们忽而和蔼可亲，忽而冷酷无情。

sentences.english: And off a blossom in mid-air stands still.
sentences.chinese: 忽而静静地在半空如一树繁花。

sentences.english: Just as we neared S Gate, the handlebar suddenly caught someone, and they slowly fell down.
sentences.chinese: 刚近S门，忽而车把上带著一个人，慢慢地倒了。

sentences.english: The weather here varies between cool and very hot.
sentences.chinese: 这里的天气变化很大，忽而凉爽忽而酷热。

sentences.english: The weather here varies between cool and very hot.
sentences.chinese: 这里的天气变化很大，忽而凉爽忽而酷热。

sentences.english: We were just approaching S-Gate when we knocked into someonewho slowly toppled over.
sentences.chinese: 刚近S门，忽而车把上带着一个人，慢慢地倒了。

sentences.english: He invited me to definitely render unto today again yesterday, didn't expect he was striven for dead.
sentences.chinese: 昨天他又约我今天一定交还，不料他忽而被人谋死。

sentences.english: Power that comes too fast corrupts.
sentences.chinese: 权力突忽而至，腐化也随之展开。

sentences.english: Parrots in flocks dart in and out of the light.
sentences.chinese: 成群的鹦鹉忽而飞进树荫里，忽而飞入阳光里。

sentences.english: Parrots in flocks dart in and out of the light.
sentences.chinese: 成群的鹦鹉忽而飞进树荫里，忽而飞入阳光里。

sentences.english: With as for is not detected, but momentarily present again.
sentences.chinese: 以至于不被觉察，但又忽而呈现。

sentences.english: Here was father with two cows.
sentences.chinese: 忽而是爸爸领着两头牛。
